title: Red Is Dead
description: A group of friends gather for a dinner party, unaware that a Communist murderer plans to pay them a visit.
altHero: Yuri, the Communist murderer wearing a welding hammer and wielding a hammer and sickle
alt1: Benjamin and Sandy huddle close, frightened
alt2: Sandy wraps herself in a towel after a shower
alt3: Benjamin wrestles Yuri, who has his hammer raised
alt4: Benjamin is on his car phone in the woods at night, not realizing Yuri is right behind him
